mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply ( inquiry_id, inquiry_writer_email, title, content, writer_email ) VALUES ( #{inquiryId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{inquiryWriterEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writerEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, inquiry_id, inquiry_writer_email, writer_email, title, content, TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_date, TO_CHAR(updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS updated_date FROM tbl_reply WHERE inquiry_id = #{inquiryId, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND inquiry_writer_email = #{inquiryWriterEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
